column2: why WOULDN'T you want a bat that says hot sauce is my only question for you. If you love Lemonade (and if you don't my next question would be: What in the world is wrong with you?) then you will need this bat.
An artistic wonder. Bey has seriously outdone herself with this one.
Lyrically her most RAW and open album yet. AMAZING!
Only downfall is getting it on. Hardest struggle in my life! Other than that absolutely love it.
Only downfall is getting it on. Hardest struggle in my life!
